metadata.title: CVE-2023-2723 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in DevTools in Google Chrome prior to 113.0.5672.126 alloweda remote attacker who had compromised the renderer process to potentiallyexploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page. (Chromium securityseverity: High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
